item.title: Report X-2024010429
item.description:
Report X-2024010429

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-23T15:11:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-10
  • City: GREENSBORO
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: CALL WAS MADE TO THE DMP CAGE ABOUT A LEAKING HAZMAT PACKAGE. PACKAGE WAS FOUND ON THE FLOOR WITH THE CORNERS OF THE PACKAGE WET. FOLLOWING ALL PROPER RESPONDER METHODS, PACKAGE WAS SECURED BY RESPONDER AND RETURNED TO THE DMP CAGE TO BE PROCESSED

item.title: Report E-2024010364
item.description:
Report E-2024010364

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-22T15:12:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-06
  • City: KERNERSVILLE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: It was reported a spill of about 2 quarts of Thixon OSN-2-EF (UN1133) out of one 50gal metal drum which was punctured by a forklift, causing the release to the dock floor. The SDS for the product was reviewed with the terminal and determined that the spill could safely be cleaned by the terminal staff. The waste was collected into one 100gal metal overpack drum and left onsite for the terminal to manage.

Report X-2024010444

  • City: DURHAM
  • State: NC

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: the package was placed on the side table by package handers for qa due to the package leaking. DescribePack: large cracks in the side of one of the four bottles inside the package. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: absorbent mats placed over spill

item.title: Report X-2024010223
item.description:
Report X-2024010223

  • City: KERNERSVILLE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE DRUM WAS FOUND ON THE DOCK WITH A HOLE/PUNCTURE ON THE TOP CORNER. DescribePack: 3 MM HOLE AT THE TOP RIM. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PLACED UPRIGHT AND PLACED IN A PLASTIC BAG.

item.title: Report X-2024010248
item.description:
Report X-2024010248

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-18T15:13:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-21
  • City: CHARLOTTE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2024010248 SequenceEvent: Dropped hazmat caused a punctured whole in the metal can which caused the hazmat to leak DescribePack: Dropping a hazmat is dangerous in the case the pail was punctured DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Dropped hazmat caused the liquid to release. 2. X-2024010249 SequenceEvent: DAMAGED DURING UNLOADING, FELL OFF THE BELT DescribePack: LID/PUNCTURED WHICH CAUSED INTERNAL LEAKAGE DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: APPLIED SPILL FIX TO SECURE THE SAFETY OF OTHERS.
